attributes.action: strongly condemn the negative message on climate change contained in the UK entry for the Eurovision Song Contest 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Pop band Scooch have been selected to represent the UK in the finals of the Eurovision song contest. Their song "Flying the Flag" promotes air travel, a leading cause of harmful greenhouse gas emissions, as a normal and desirable activity.

To allow the song to represent the UK in its current form would send a confused and negative message at a time when the government is claiming to lead Europe on action against climate change.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
